buildTriggerIntent

public static android.app.PendingIntent buildTriggerIntent(android.content.Context context,
                                                           Trigger trigger)
Creates a pending intent that can be used to execute the trigger with the given id.

Parameters:
service - the service under whose authority to launch the intent
info - Trigger trigger to run
Returns:
PendingIntent object for running the trigger
